name: 'Ninety Miles Away' Trivia Quiz | 'West Wing' - Season 6 | 10 Questions

questions.text: When the President was sitting in Leo's office, what Ernest Hemingway book was he reading from?
options: The Old Man And The Sea
questions.explanation:
A Farewell To Arms.

	The passage the President read was, "The world breaks everyone. And afterward, many are strong at the broken places. Those that will not break, it kills. It kills the very good and the very gentle and the very brave, impartially". Leo read the whole collection of Hemingway while he was in Sierra Tucson for thirty days.

questions.text: What President of the United States did President Bartlet say signed a bill forbidding Cuban products in the United States?
questions.explanation:
John F. Kennedy

	Five days after the Bay of Pigs, President Kennedy asked his press secretary to find him 1,000 Cuban cigars. After his press secretary brought him the cigars, President Kennedy signed an embargo outlawing Cuban products in the United States.

questions.text: What was the name of Kate's ex-CIA partner that she met in a bar?
questions.explanation:
Andy.

	Andy Luzon was played by Alex Fernandez. Kate met Andy in a bar and found out that Leo had recently been in Cuba.

questions.text: What did Charlie tell CJ was wrong with the White House building?
questions.explanation:
Termites.

	CJ had Charlie take care of the termites. He talked to two sets of people. One group wanted to exterminate the termites and the other group wanted to study them. CJ made it clear that she wasn't going to tent the White House.

questions.text: When Margaret retrieved Kate's file for CJ, what familiar name did CJ find in a part of Kate's file?
questions.explanation:
Leo.

	When CJ received Kate's file, most of it was blacked out because of her black ops work in different countries, but CJ told Leo that she found his name in the file. Leo didn't know why Leo's activities in Florida would be in Kate's file.

questions.text: Leo went to Cuba to speak to whom?
questions.explanation:
Fidel Castro.

	Leo went to Cuba to see if he could work out a new deal between the United States and Cuban trade. Kate found out about the trip and told CJ that the news was going to broadcast Leo's trip to Cuba because a man of Leo's importance couldn't go to Cuba and it not be found out that he was there.

questions.text: Was Margaret able to forge CJ's signature?
questions.explanation:
Yes.

	CJ told her to do it so she could get Kate's file. Margaret said that her hand writing was going to be harder to forge because CJ's handwriting was more aggressive than the President's handwriting.

Brian Dennehy.

	Brian Dennehy played Florida Senator Rafe Framingham. During his conversation with Senator Framingham, Cliff became aware that the Senator knew Kate Harper from a long time ago. When Leo met with Senator Framingham, they talked about drinking together and the Senator mentioned Kate's name again.

questions.text: What year did Kate and Leo meet in Florida?
questions.explanation:
1995.

	The year 1995 was revealed in a flashback when Kate was thinking back to when she found a drunken Leo wondering in the parking lot of a bar and drove him to his hotel. He had been at a Bay of Pigs veterans meeting.

questions.text: Did Leo remember that he had met Kate once before?
questions.explanation:
No.

	In the situation room, Leo asked Kate if she remembered him from Florida. Kate asked Leo if he remembered her and nothing else was said about it. In the flashback as Kate was driving Leo back to his hotel, she said this was something she wouldn't forget.
